mapper.sql: nSPUID, sSPUBriefName, sSPUName, sMetaKeywords, nCategoryID, nBrandID, nImageID, sDescription, sCode, sIsVirtual, dCreateTime, dUpdateTime

select
distinct
from r_ec_spu
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into r_ec_spu
nSPUID,
sSPUBriefName,
sSPUName,
sMetaKeywords,
nCategoryID,

nImageID,

update r_ec_spu

sSPUBriefName = #{record.sspubriefname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
